description: Request used to create or update a webhook

objectId.description: The id of the Synapse object to receive events of.

objectType.description: Which type of Synapse object is associated with the Webhook.

eventTypes.description: The list of event types to subscribe to.

invokeEndpoint.description: The webhook endpoint where the events will be sent to. Must be 255 Characters or less.

isEnabled.description: True if the webhook should be enabled. If false no events will be pushed to the endpoint.
